script:
# script "lisp"
# background %(wayback_background)s
# bgmfile "bgm255" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# fadein "black" 0.5
# textflame 0 0
# face %(unit_a)s "usual"
@
帰り道－

# fadein "white" 0.5
# se "SE_0735"
# bgm "stop"
# waitandnext 2
@
…………

# fadein "white" 0.5
# se "SE_0735"
# waitandnext 2
@
…………

@
ふと、
傍らを歩く彼女が足を止めた…

# bgmfile "bgm255" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# textflame 1 1
# voice 6013 "sistrum_0001"
@シストルム
急にマスターと
クイズがしたくなったにゃ♪

# eye %(unit_a)s "close"
@シストルム
もちろん！
マスターお気に入りの
ボクについてのクイズにゃ～

# voice 6013 "sistrum_0029"
# eye %(unit_a)s "normal"
# face %(unit_a)s "smile"
@シストルム
間違えたら
キライになっちゃうにゃ！
いっくにゃ～♪

# face %(unit_a)s "usual"
@シストルム
ボクの身長はわかるかにゃ？

# se "SE_0734"
# select "150cm" "select_label_1" "155cm" "select_label_2" "145cm" "select_label_3"
ボクの身長はわかるかにゃ？

# label "select_label_1"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_2"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_3"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# sestop "SE_0734"
# fadeout "black" 1.2
# waitandnext 2
